messages.body: Crown Castle International Corporation director just picked up 8,050 shares  http://www.conferencecalltranscripts.org/4/summary2/?id=8487215 $CCI

links.title: Conference Call Transcripts
links.description: Get notified next time CCI.US makes a similar move! J Landis Martin, a director of Crown Castle International Corporation, recently acquired 8,050 shares of the company. The buys took place at prices ranging from $160.89 to $161.55 per share, on October 27, 2020. Martin now owns 173,243 shares of the company.
